TopicTitle: The Kraken Pegasus I Mobility Enhancer of Infinity!

Articles.Content:
Our main trio of heroes went for a joy ride on the Mun.

Uhm Jeb.... the wheels are off the surface.

Bill "Situation Normal"

The inevitable happens but then.....

Bob discovers the unusual... The Kraken Pegasus I Mobility Enhancer of Infinity!

Bob climbed and climbed on the invisible ladder above 10K, until he was too tired to continue but wondered, "Where did this ladder eventually lead".

I really regret not making a hard save at this point. Could I have climbed to another orbital body if the ladder lined up? Would adjusting the position of the rover changed the ladder's inclination?

Iv had that problem before but it was after i moved it around with KAS

YAY 200TH POST

I had the same thing when I crashed my SSTO into one of Kerbin's oceans. One kerbal just kept climbing deeper and deeper, despite any attempt to stop him...

I eventually reverted to the launch pad
Bob was controllable at all times, thankfully.
